titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of the Black Alumni Network RG.7.5.2.1
titlestmt.author: Stacey Flatt

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-21 14:39:04 -0500.

did.unittitle: Records of the Black Alumni Network

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York University. Black Alumni Network

did.abstract: The Records of the Black Alumni Network contain promotional material for the NYU Black Alumni Network's 2017 "Discovering our Legacy" programs, informational fliers, and a 2012 Milestones of Diversity publication.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records contain promotional material for the Black Alumni Network's 2017 Discovering our Legacy programs, informational fliers, and a 2012 Milestones of Diversity publication.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The NYU Black Alumni Network seeks to empower, connect, and celebrate the Black Community within the greater New York University network. The Black Alumni Network unites alumni and students of the NYU community in collaboration with the NYU Alumni Relations by establishing relationships, connections, and opportunities to alumni of the African diaspora.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact university-archives@nyu.edu.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Jamila Mclaughlin, November 2017. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.072.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Records of the Black Alumni Network; RG 7.5.2.1; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning, materials were housed in an acid-free folder and shared box.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and Colleges -- Alumni and alumnae.
